Synopsis:
---------
Dave Kujan ( Chazz Palminteri ), a special agent for the U.S. Customs Service , is investigating the cause of the fire of a ship at the port of San Pedro in Los Angeles, which caused 27 fatalities, but all appear to have been killed . Their only source of information is Roger Kint (Kevin Spacey), a crippled con man who survived the fire .At the police station , Kint that all began six weeks earlier in New York, when five offenders five "usual suspects" were arrested for a wheel of recognition related to the theft of a truckload of weapons ...
